fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm upgrade.sh --clean respects confirmation prompts
fields.request_details: In a fresh working copy with an existing db.sqlite3, run ./upgrade.sh --clean --no-restart. Decline the prompt and confirm the command exits with status 1 while leaving the database files intact. Rerun with --clean --no-restart --no-warn and verify the warning is skipped and the database files are removed.
